item.title: Pull request #455 created
item.description:
410: Converting doubles to decimals, fractional digits

@michaelhkay In this PR, I tried to undo the changes that were introduced to make comparisons transitive. I havenâ€™t made any changes to distinct-values and group by, because I am uncertain if I have spotted all the relevant parts of the specification. Maybe/hopefully we can address them in a next step.

Any feedback is welcome.
